issues.title: Bug in login page
issues.description: There is a bug on the login page where users cannot submit their login details.

issues.title: UI Improvement in dashboard
issues.description: Improve the user interface of the dashboard to make it more user-friendly.

issues.title: Database connection issue
issues.description: The application is unable to connect to the database after the recent update.

issues.title: Feature request: Dark mode
issues.description: Users have requested an option for dark mode in the app settings.

issues.title: API rate limit exceeded
issues.description: The API is returning rate limit errors, causing failures in user requests.

issues.title: Payment gateway integration bug
issues.description: The payment gateway is failing to process transactions after the recent update.

issues.title: Mobile app crash on startup
issues.description: The mobile app crashes immediately upon launch for users on iOS.

issues.title: Server downtime due to overload
issues.description: The server is experiencing downtime due to high traffic and resource overload.
